name: test_e2e_with_logs[476_CMDI_CLOUD_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMDI_CLOUD_002` |
| **Name** | GCloud auth command injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | cloud_cmd |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;gcloud auth list`
- **Encoded**: `%3Bgcloud%20auth%20list`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~49000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:40.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_CLOUD_002-1772268940698-b0fpk pattern_id=CMDI_CLOUD_002 uri=/?q=%3Bgcloud%20auth%20list client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMDI_CLOUD_002-1772268940698-b0fpk pattern_id=CMDI_CLOUD_002 uri=/?q=%3Bgcloud%20auth%20list client=127.0.0.1
